description: Provide affordable, productive work environments and a full range of real property services, including workplace solutions, property and facilities management, portfolio and asset management, project management and delivery, technical services, and real estate services.
full_summary:
================
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**
--------

**Request for Proposal - Property Management Services - National Capital Region**

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS3945710748-Doc4441195721

**Tender Overview**
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for a Property Management Services contract to manage various government-owned properties located in the National Capital Region (NCR). The contracted services will include a range of responsibilities such as workplace solutions, property and facilities management, portfolio and asset management, project management and delivery, technical services, and real estate services.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   Contract Start Date: April 1, 2025
*   Contract End Date: March 31, 2040
*   Contract Value: To be determined

**Proposal Submission**
---------------------

Interested vendors are invited to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. The proposal submission deadline is May 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

The proposal evaluation process will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The proposals will be evaluated on the following criteria:

*   Technical capacity and expertise to deliver the required services
*   Ability to manage and maintain government-owned properties
*   Compliance with government regulations and standards
*   Proposed pricing and cost-effectiveness

**Notice URL**
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18806835?extsite=MTg4MDY4MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any queries or concerns related to the solicitation, please contact Kristen Bell-Lalonde, Real Property Services Branch, PSPC at:

 kristen.bell-lalonde@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The government retains the right to request clarification or additional information from the candidate(s) selected to proceed to the next stage of the evaluation process. The PSPC is committed to providing equal opportunities to all qualified candidates. Please note that the PSPC is an equal opportunity employer.  All candidates selected to proceed to the next stage of the evaluation process will be assured confidentiality of their information.   CSFO-BSPC of PSPC will be retained to assist in this procurement.  All questions can go to that contact as well.

 This is a solicitation of a contract under free trade agreements. Compliant suppliers familiar with the
